Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different types of habitats, such as one land habitat and one water habitat.
The student can draw and label different plants found in each habitat, showing the diversity of plant life.
The student can draw and label different animals found in each habitat, demonstrating the variety of animal life.
The student can illustrate and compare the differences in plant and animal types between the two habitats.
The student can observe and identify patterns in the types of living things found in each habitat, showing the diversity of plant and animal life across different environments.
